document_data.name: Gateway to the Afterworld
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gateway to the Afterworld''' was one of the two most significant temples of [[Osiris]] in all of [[Mulhorand]] and his preeminent temple in the town of [[Mishtan]].
document_data.Description: This temple resembled two concentric rings of towering pillars, so large that the rooms inside of them were interconnected through graceful arches.
document_data.Activities: The clergy of the Gateway administered the maintenance of the [[Land of the Dead]]—the burial grounds of the [[pharaoh]]s and their families—and the construction of tombs there.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Gateway to the Afterworld acted as the base for the majority of the Osiran religious orders in Mulhorand.
